sense.name: a systematic visual inspection or examination
sense.examples: John made a quick scan of the sports pages to find the results. The military scout made a scan of the entire beach through his binoculars. The yoga instructor told the class to make an internal scan of their bodes during the meditation.

sense.name: a digital image assembled by an electronic machine
sense.examples: The doctor scheduled a CAT scan of the patient's abdomen. The brain scan revealed a small tumor near the corpus callosum. The scan of this document is of rather poor resolution.
